Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='HTNT00')

BibliographicData.Title: Direct projections from the magnocellular division of the basal nucleus of the amygdala to the principal part of the cortical masticatory area in the macaque monkey

Reference.Quotation: "In three of the five monkeys, paired injections of WGA-HRP and BDA were made into two of the MI, SMA, CMAp and CMAd." (p. 221) "We injected WGA-HRP into the CMAp in two monkeys and confirmed by histological eyamination that the sites of WGA-HRP injection were neatly localized therein (Figs. 1 and 2A). In the same or different monkeys, WGA-HRP or BDA was similarly injected into the orofacial regons of the MI and SMA, including those related to single jaw movement and, also, into a rhythmic jaw movement-related region in the inner face of the frontal operculum, corresponding probably to the CMAd." (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

"We also observed the amygdala in the case of WGA-HRP or BDA injection into the orofacial regions of the MI and SMA and into CMAd. However, neither MI nor SMA injection did produce neuronal labeling in any amygdaloid nucleus. Very few, if any, neurons were labeled in the Bmc after BDA injection into CMAd," (p. 222)

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin
